00035 class TrajectoryReader
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     virtual ~TrajectoryReader() {}
00040     virtual bool Open(const string &file) = 0;
00041         
00042     virtual void Close() {};
00043         
00045     virtual bool FirstFrame(Topology &top) = 0;
00047     virtual bool NextFrame(Topology &top) = 0;
00048 
00049     static void RegisterPlugins(void);
00050 };
00051 
00052 // important - singleton pattern, make sure factory is created before accessed
00053 inline FileFormatFactory<TrajectoryReader> &TrjReaderFactory()
00054 {
00055     static FileFormatFactory<TrajectoryReader> _TrjReaderFactory;
00056     return _TrjReaderFactory;
00057 }
00058 
00059 }}
